Articles.Content: Hi I just wanted to say hi and thanks for making such an amazing game! I just got KSP a couple of days ago and I can't stop playing it. It really is an awesome game and I love how I am learning about orbital mechanics as I go. After college I was choosing between designing satellites and job in finance and i eventually took the finance job but this lets me see how much fun I could have had! Thanks!
Welcome to the forum, derrickchan. Happy to see you're enjoying the game as much as the rest of us.
